players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Bob's sudden demise. We should all work together to figure out who among us could have committed such a heinous act."
Charlie: "Let's focus on the facts and try to piece together what happened last night. We have a detective among us who might be able to shed some light on things."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We need to discuss the events of last night and gather more information before making any accusations."
Charlie: "I think we should let the detective investigate and share their findings before making any accusations. We don't want to jump to conclusions or mislead each other."
